title: Hemingway, a Lost Suitcase, and the Recipe for Stupidity
excerpt: No matter how good our intentions, sometimes we do incredibly stupid things, like lose a suitcase full of priceless writings. In this article, learn how to recognize the potential for stupidity before it happens.
